title: [BUG] ThetaForecaster-Deseasonalizer returns numpy.array
body:

<!--

```
     66         raise TypeError(
---> 67             f"`y` must be a pandas Series, but found type: {type(y)}")
     68

TypeError: `y` must be a pandas Series, but found type: <class 'numpy.ndarray'>
```
-->

**To Reproduce**

```python
from sktime.forecasting.compose import ReducedRegressionForecaster
from sktime.forecasting.theta import ThetaForecaster
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
y = pd.Series("34 34 39 46 47 50 53 58 61 58 57 59 64 67 72 74".split(' ',-1)).astype(float)
model = ReducedRegressionForecaster(regressor=ThetaForecaster(smoothing_level=.2,sp=1), window_length=3, strategy="recursive")
model.fit(y)
model.predict(pd.Series(list(np.arange(3) + y.index[-1])))

```

**Expected behavior**
<!--
Should receive input as pandas.Series, but it is being transformed to numpy.array by the Deseasonalizer
-->

Add any other context about the problem here.
